title: Week 1 - Bootcamp Days 1-11
focus: Review-heavy week (you may batch 23 bootcamp days per study session).

title: Week 2 - Bootcamp Days 12-25
focus: Review-heavy week (you may batch 23 bootcamp days per study session). OOP Coffee/Quiz days get slightly more focus.

title: Week 3 - Bootcamp Days 26-35
focus: Review-heavy but transitioning to more complex GUI + API work. Still 2 bootcamp days per study session.

title: Week 4 - Bootcamp Days 36-45
focus: Mixed week: regular pace (mostly 2 bootcamp days per study session). Focus on APIs, automation, and first larger data/HTML projects.

title: Week 5 - Bootcamp Days 46-55
focus: Mixed week: regular pace (~2 bootcamp days per study session). Focus on scraping + Selenium bots + Flask intro.

title: Week 6 - Bootcamp Days 56-65
focus: Heavy project week: advanced Flask/web; keep pace at ~2 bootcamp days per study session, no 3-day batches.

title: Week 7 - Bootcamp Days 66-75
focus: Heavy project week: REST APIs, auth, multi-user blogs, and data science intro. Still ~2 bootcamp days per session.

title: Week 8 - Bootcamp Days 76-80
focus: Capstone & portfolio week: 1 bootcamp day per session with extra time for polishing and reflection.
